title: In Search of Love - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Historical   Mystery   Psychological   Romance
tags: Ancient China   Crime   Fated Lovers   Female Protagonist   Gate to Another World   Genius Protagonist   Gods   Murders   Older Love Interests   Parallel Worlds   Transported to Another World
author: Ming Yue Ting Feng   明月听风
description:
Criminal psychologist and ‘leftover’ woman Su Xiaopei was informed by the God Of Marital Fates, Yue Lao, that her destined lover had been in a car accident, which caused his soul to be sent to another world. But because the red strings of fate between them were bound so tightly, both would suffer three reincarnations of loveless lives if the strings were ever broken. And so, Su Xiaopei was ordered to bring back this mysterious man.

But what does he look like? No idea.

What is his personality like? No idea.

What does he do for a living? No idea.

Can she opt not go? Of course not.

As a believer in all things logical, Su Xiaopei found herself running up against a serious wall.

The bottom line: This is a story about a modern female psychologist who traveled to an alternative, ancient Chinese world and an adorable warrior as they experience love and solve crimes.
>
